entry.title: Wednesday night: Chance of flurries. Low minus 16. POP 30%
entry.summary: Cloudy with 30 percent chance of flurries. Wind becoming north 20 km/h near midnight. Low minus 16. Wind chill minus 11 this evening and minus 25 overnight. Forecast issued 6:11 PM EST Wednesday 25 January 2023

entry.title: Thursday: Chance of flurries. High minus 15. POP 30%
entry.summary: Cloudy with 30 percent chance of flurries in the morning. Clearing late in the morning. Wind north 20 km/h becoming light in the afternoon. High minus 15. Wind chill minus 27 in the morning and minus 20 in the afternoon. UV index 1 or low. Forecast issued 6:11 PM EST Wednesday 25 January 2023
